statements: DELETE FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE type = 'Solar' AND capacity > 100
DELETE FROM SolarPanels WHERE location = 'New York' AND capacity > 50.0;
DELETE FROM WindTurbines WHERE rotor_diameter <= 100.0 AND location = 'California';
DELETE FROM wind_turbines WHERE turbine_type = 'Offshore' AND turbine_capacity < 100
DELETE FROM HydroelectricPlants WHERE location = 'River Valley';
DELETE FROM WindTurbines WHERE location = 'California' AND height > 100;
DELETE FROM energy_sources WHERE location = 'California' AND capacity < 100
DELETE FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'efficiency' AND metric_value > 0.9
